description:
An update to the previous Ext-B1 shovel, the Dozer 1T has a new shaft cross-section for greater strength and better grip. The whole package breaks down small to leave room in your bag for your other backcountry gear.

  • Strong ovo-concave shaft extends and is easy to grip
  • Stompable, flat blade cuts smooth pit walls and penetrates hard debris
  • Packable rectangular-section blade
  • Extended length is 76cm, collapsed length is 57cm
name: Backcountry Access Dozer 1T Shovel
